page.title: 19HOBBIES AND GAMES
page.content: Children have interests called{hobbies The most popular is{riding bikes,}like BMX,on which children perform stunts. They collect stamps & dolls from round the world. Some people enjoy drawing, horse riding,music & farmwork. Popular also are{collecting}miniatures,books, rubbers,badges,marbles,antiques,toys, teddies & stones.People like looking at trains & animals.{Computers}are used to play games and write programs. Cooking and DIY are enjoyed.Children also play games,they are played at school playtimes & at home.{Games}have rules and we try to keep to them. In {football}2 teams of 11 try to kick a ball into a goal.{Netball}is similar but the ball is thrown.{Rounders}& {cricket}involve hitting a hard ball.In {tig}1 person is on & the others have to get away.In{hide & seek}1 person is on & has to find the others.
